data.text:
Santa Maria weather in April (California, United States of America)

What is the weather forecast for Santa Maria in April? Discover if this is the best time for your journey with our detailed monthly weather breakdown.

Temperatures

You’ll find the weather in Santa Maria during April to be perfect, with pleasant temperatures and low rainfall. Expect temperatures to climb to 21°C during the day, with nighttime readings dropping to 7°C.

Precipitation

Santa Maria in April usually receives low rainfall, averaging around 28 mm for the month. Records from the past 30 years suggest that around 5 days will experience rain.

If you favor pleasant temperatures and minimal rainfall, April is one of the better months to visit Santa Maria. March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October and November typically offer the most agreeable circumstances. On the other hand, January, February and December tend to be characterized by conditions that may not be as optimal.

So, what should you wear in this month?

For visitors traveling to Santa Maria, we recommend wearing layers. So maybe a skirt, t-shirt, shorts for during the day and jeans and a warm jacket for some days and evenings.
